p: Oils and fats have important roles in cooking, frying and salad dressings or in food formulations; they make an important contribution to our diet and our health. Omega-3 (ω3) fatty acids such as linolenic acid, and omega-6 (ω6) fatty acids such as linoleic acid, are essential fatty acids; thus, they must be supplied through foods. Today, most of the oils consumed in our daily diet such as corn, sunflower, rice bran and grape seed oils have a high amount of ω6fatty acids and therefore, lead to ω6:ω3 ratio increases ranging from 8-12:1; however, this ratio should be 4:1.1
